wiki_section_title: Club information

wiki_section_text: 

intro: The 2006 League of Ireland Premier Division was the 22nd season of the League of Ireland Premier Division. The division was made up of 12 teams. Shelbourne were champions while Derry City finished as runners-up. However Shelbourne were subsequently relegated to the First Division and had to withdraw from the 2007-08 UEFA Champions League and 2007 Setanta Sports Cup because of their financial difficulties.

qa.question: The home stadium of the Bray Wanderers of 2006 League of Ireland is situated behind what station ?
